item.description: We prayed for rain, and our prayers were answered. We just forgot to pray that it stopped for our Saturday hunt, so the date has changed from Sat. Sept 24th to Sun. Sept 25th. See you at Harold Parker State Forest in North Andover at 10:30 am.
item.how_to_find_us: Harold Parker State Forest in North Andover Ma.
item.name: Sept. 24th hunt has changed to Sept 25th due to rain.
